issues.description: A reachable exception (opcode 0xfe) has been detected. This can be caused by type errors, division by zero, out-of-bounds array access, or assert violations. This is acceptable in most situations. Note however that `assert()` should only be used to check invariants. Use `require()` for regular input checking.
issues.title: Exception state

issues.description:
In the function `whaleWantMyEther()` the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.number
- block.number
issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function whaleWantMyEther(). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
